Qian-Qian.tag_cn: 主势上升，贵在坚持与担当
bullets_cn: 适用：当作空间趋势提示，而不是吉凶断语。
看法：先看『谁住哪』再看『门/阳台纳气』，最后才谈体验感。
建议：先做低成本微调（动线、照明、收纳、干湿区），再决定大改动。
bullets_en: Use it as a spatial tendency hint—not a fate verdict.
Read order: who sleeps where → where air/people enter → lived experience.
Start with low-cost tweaks (flow, light, storage, wet/dry) before big renovations.
